title: Sci-Fi Weapons - Laser Guns - CyberTroops 2040
description: 500+ high quality futuristic sci-fi weapons sound effects!
longDescription:
Youtube Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lrFuFURaj_Y


CyberTroops 2040 sound library features high quality laser weapons sound effects. If you’re looking to expand your sound collection with different types of cutting edge future weapon shots, laser blasts and bursts, this is the sound library for you.


With this diverse collection of cutting edge futuristic weapon and sci-fi guns at your disposal you’ll have a powerful audio arsenal for immersing your audience in a cybernetic combat experience!


If you like the sound of CyberTroops 2040 then be sure to check out - SCI-FI WEAPONS and much anticipated - SCI-FI WEAPONS 2 sound libraries as well!


CyberTroops 2040 sound library contains 513 sound effects separated into twelve categories:


1. Sniper Rifles

2. Assault Rifles

3. Electric Guns

4. Plasma Guns

5. Bio Guns

6. Heavy Pistols

7. Light Pistols

8. Shotguns

9. Machine Guns

10. Submachine Guns

11. Grenades

12. Source Sound Accessories


CyberTroops 2040 - Sci-Fi Weapons Sound Effects List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 513

Number of Audio Cues: 513

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: Some sound effects are set to loop

Minutes of audio provided: 11.08 min
